column4: hello, can someone help  me please. yesterday i got the stupid idea in my head to play with beryl and i somehow screwed up my nvida driver. Now i don't have proper graphics on my computer.
hello, can someone help  me please. yesterday i got the stupid idea in my head to play with beryl and i somehow screwed up my nvida driver. Now i don't have proper graphics on my computer.
i have since removed it
slart i wish someone told me that before! i knew it was stupid to play with it
lol
hehe.. that cube is alluring.. but you can play with compiz now.. it's even shinier
that damn cube!
you've tried using the restricted drivers thingy?
well basically. i think it just deleted my default settings. i have a nice gui now everything looks fine just cant use the effects
and you're using the binary nvidia drivers?
run "glxgears -info" in a terminal and check the top of the output
try setting 4 horizontal desktops
in the first section in the settings manager
how do you change the cap and dome?
ask in #compiz-fusion, that's where the bling bling people hang out
I have no idea myself... I don't even have the cube enabled any more
lol i'm not a bling bling guy im just a cuber :D
I'm pretty sure you'll find some cuber-friends in that channel too =)
I use quod libet.. it works for me

then tell us what kind of media player you want? something big and shiny with lots of extras like amarok? or are you running it on a mini-itx server hidden in your car? you could use mpd in that case.. we don't know what you want

then why didn't you say that from the beginning.. would have saved us all a lot of wear and tear on the keyboard =).. look at audacious.. it's winamp but without the media library.. I have no idea what to do about the bluetooth headset.. bluetooth isn't working for me at all on intrepid
its just a usb not bluetooth
its a normal usb headphone no idea why i cant swch from default
